calc package¶

Implements and automates quantum-chemical calculations.

Subpackages¶

  • calc.lib package
  • calc.saver package

Submodules¶

calc.graph module¶

Implements nested directed graphs. Like folders, they organize DFT computations.

class calc.graph.Node¶

Bases: object

A generic node in a nested directed graph.

Variables:
  • name (str) – Node’s name. Hint: don’t insert /.
  • x (float) – x coordinate for Ogma.js. float in (-200, 200).
  • y (float) – y coordinate
class calc.graph.Graph¶

Bases: calc.lib.Graph, calc.graph.Node

Implements a nested directed graph \(\subset\) state.root. Borrows from the Linux Filesystem paradigm.

Is-a Node. Is-a lib.Graph. Has-a few more tricks borrowed from the Linux FileSystem metaphor.

ls()¶
Returns:generator that recursively iterates through self
cd(path)¶
Parameters:path (unicode) – one of
  • relative path. parent .., previous -, root ‘/’ supported
  • absolute path, e.g. /QD/15A vacuum
Return type:

graph.Node
Raises:
  • LookupError – if non-existent
  • ValueError – if path is illegal
pwd¶
Returns:absolute path
